{"id":621206738,"lang":"java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1642364009,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/621206738/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reformat The String","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public String reformat(String s) {\n        int ds = 0, as = 0;\n        if (s == null || s.length() == 0) return \"\";\n        \n        for (char c : s.toCharArray())\n            if (Character.isDigit(c)) ds++;\n            else as++;\n        \n        if (Math.abs(as - ds) > 1) return \"\";\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        boolean isDigit = ds > as;\n        for (int a = 0, d = 0, i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            if (isDigit) {\n                while (!Character.isDigit(s.charAt(d))) d++;\n                sb.append(s.charAt(d++));\n            } else {\n                while (Character.isDigit(s.charAt(d))) a++;\n                sb.append(s.charAt(a++));\n            }\n        }\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reformat-the-string"}
